page.title: 12POPULATION.
page.content: In our Domesday{area}live about {10000 people.}The{most populated}area is{Skelton}with a population of{6696. The next largest village is{Lingdale {(1794),}and the third-largest is {Boosbeck; 1034. A{quarter}of the population is {below the age of 15; 60% is between the working ages of{16 and 65;}and{15% {exceed}the age of{65. {Between 50 and 60%}of families {own their home,}this depends on the village in which they live. The remaining{40% of homes}belong to the {council,}although a{small number}of homes are owned by the{castle estate. At the{moment}there are{3587 houses(1985), and by{1991}the projected number will be{3800.
